data.title: E04
data.shorttext: Both in form and Construction the designs four elements are joined together in an elegant construction without any use of any other material.
data.text: The designs four elements are joined together in an elegant construction without any use of any other material. It is a clean, sophisticated and clever A design that holds an identity of a graceful and proud diamond.The function is both a stool and a coffee table.
data.project-title: E04 - Both in form and Construction
